tool.name: bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
tool.description: Create intersections, unions and complements of VCF files

param.name: nfiles
param.label: Nfiles
param.help: Output positions present in this many (=), this many or more (+), this many or fewer (-), the exact (~) files

param.name: complement
param.label: Complement
param.help: Output positions present only in the first file but missing in the others

param.name: prefix
param.label: subset each of the input files
